__e: He may seem shy, but once you get his clothes off, he's a monster.
I used to think you were shy... but now I think it's something else.
He was really embarrassed. But I told him it didn't really matter.
He is a very shy and gentle man, but perhaps we could persuade him to sing for us.
You know, when we were kids and you and Tommy came to live with us... you were so shy. So gentle.
Then I remembered what you said, that he's shy.
What's the matter, honey? Goin' shy on me?
Come on, Jay, don't be shy. I'll take it all off if you will.
